short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Encourages mindful browsing by adding a short delay with a breathing exercise before accessing selected websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pause & Breathe is a productivity Chrome extension designed to help users manage online habits by creating a short, mindful pause before accessing selected websites. Users can set custom delay times for sites like Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok, and during the delay, a calming breathing exercise overlay encourages mindfulness. After the exercise, users can decide whether they still want to access the site or close it, with a daily tally tracking how often they choose to skip. This extension empowers users to take mindful control of their online time, promoting focus and intentional browsing.
